body:
[???]: "The car's on fire and there's no driver at the wheel." 

[1]: "What's going on?" 
[2]: "Who are you?" 
[3]: "A dark wind blows."
title: Start1

body:
[???]: "There are more questions than answers, and the more you find out, the less you know." 

[1]: "What do you mean?"
title: Questions

body:
[???]: "You're pathetic... You don't even know who you are... You're nothing." 

[1]: "Quit talking nonsense and tell me what's going on!" 
[2]: "I'm sorry..."
title: Next

body:
[???]: "There's no time for that." 

[1]: "What's going on?"
title: Sorry

body:
[Tutorial Agent]: "Hey there! I'm here to help you learn how to navigate this journey." 

[Press 1 to Continue]
title: Tutorial_Hello

body:
[Tutorial Agent]: "You can move around and interact with others to gain experience. Try to collect as many items as you can; once collected they'll be stored in your inventory. The skills you just chose will determine how well you do on skill checks. Furthermore..." 

[1]: "What are you even talking about? Who was that before you? What's going on?" 
[2]: "What's a skill check?" 
[3]: "Sure Sure, just let me play the game!"
title: Tutorial

body:
[Tutorial Agent]: "Skill Checks are used to determine the outcome of an action. Each Check is linked to a certain *part* of you. The stronger that inner part of yourself is, the higher will your odds be. For example, if you're trying to persuade someone, you'll need a high *Eloquence* to make your odds better. Got it?" 

[1]: "Can you repeat the whole thing one more time?" 
[2]: "Got it, let's get this over with."
title: Tutorial_SkillRolls

body:
[Tutorial Agent]: "I'm sorry, I can't answer that. There are some things you have to figure out on your own." 

[1]: "Can you repeat those instructions again?" 
[2]: "Whatever you say, can we just get started?"
title: Tutorial_Confusion

body:
[Tutorial Agent]: "Great! Let's get started. But remember, beware of time." 

[Press 1 to Begin]
title: Begin
